data.title: haver which means that my media interests tend to come from hyperfixations which means that I consume them... – @tellthemeerkatsitsfine on Tumblr
data.meta_description: Okay so I am an ADHD-haver which means that my media interests tend to come from hyperfixations which means that I consume them nonstop for a while and then my interest in them just ends abruptly and…
data.text: That is very cool, thank you so much for sending me this! I love that the things I write can be interesting to people who are coming at it from all kinds of perspectives. Honestly I am very much just writing down whatever I happen to find interesting because it makes me feel better to have somewhere to put all that, and it makes me really happy every time I hear about other people enjoying it. It's quite cool that that can happen separate from the source material as well, I think that makes sense in a way because the best things about media are things that can be related to real life so they can be recognized by anyone.
